data.strFullDescription:
Summoners War: Chronicles is an Action RPG that explores the conflicts and decisions that led to the state of the world (as seen in the original Summoners War: Sky Arena). You will play as one of three Summoners: Orbia, Kina, and Cleaf, as you explore the continents, Summon Monsters, and fight back the darkness that leaks through the Rift of Worlds.
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2167580/extras/SWCH_GL_HEADER_RE.png?t=1678369249[/img]											

[b]KEY GAME FEATURES[/b]

[h2]Choose Your Character[/h2]
 Choose between three Summoners, each with a unique role and skill set.
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2167580/extras/SWCH_GL_01_EN.png?t=1678369249[/img]

[h2]Fight Alongside Your Monsters[/h2]
Summon a team from over 350 Monsters and join them on the battlefield for the first time!
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2167580/extras/en_02.gif?t=1678369249[/img]

[h2]Action RPG Combat[/h2]
Evade enemy attacks, command your Monsters, and cast spells in real-time combat encounters.
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2167580/extras/skill-03.gif?t=1678369249[/img]

[h2]Endless Adventure[/h2]
Explore a vast world comprised of multiple continents.
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2167580/extras/cutscene_04.gif?t=1678369249[/img]

[h2]Game Modes[/h2]
Delve into loot-filled Dungeons, climb the many-floored Ascensions, and take on Raids with friends! Then head to the Arena to compete against other players!
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2167580/extras/raid_05.gif?t=1678369249[/img]

[h2]Summoners War Reimagined[/h2]
Experience the expanded universe of Summoners War, and immerse yourself in the untold story of the Rahil Kingdom.
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2167580/extras/adventure_06.gif?t=1678369249[/img]
data.strSnippet: The King of Rahil is looking for a Summoner to protect the kingdom against Tefo's enormous conspiracy. Your story as a Rahil Guard begins now! Explore a vast world with your Summoned companions by your side in this new Action RPG set in the Summoners War Universe.
